name: Consecrated Flying Serpent
title: Remnant Squall: Consecrated Flying Serpent
desc: A flying serpent that became twisted and warped by eating some great being. Now, it commands the fearsome winds.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Consecrated Flying Serpent

skills.name: Swirling Squall
skills.desc: Deal 2 Physical DMG and draw 1 card.

skills.name: Scattershot Vortex
skills.desc: Deals 2 Physical DMG. Discard all Bonecruncher's Energy Block cards in your Hand. Double the DMG dealt once for every 2 cards you Discard.

skills.name: Immortal Remnants: Anemo
skills.desc: (Passive) When battle begins, create 6 Bonecruncher's Energy Block and place them evenly into your deck.
